original_description: Set EcoBee thermostat to Home or Away based on a change in armed state of your Blue by ADT system. You may select a specific arm type such as Armed Away, Armed Stay, Armed Instant, or Armed - Any mode for your Blue by ADT system. Next, select your Thermostat Name and select Comfort Profile to away, which will hold your comfort profile until next transition. Optionally, you may also select your Arm Type as a Disarmed state, select your Thermostat Name and set Comfort Profile to home.

original_description: Have a fan, portable AC unit, or other cooling device hooked up to a Smart Life plug or outlet? Pair this Applet with Applet HZCxKUhq (https://ifttt.com/applets/HZCxKUhq-turn-on-a-smart-life-device-if-the-temperature-rises-above-a-threshold) to also turn your device on when the temperature rises above a threshold.

original_description: Set Nest thermostat temperature based on a change in armed state of your LifeShield system. You may select a specific arm type such as Armed Away, Armed Stay, Armed Instant, or Armed - Any mode for your LifeShield system. Next, select your Thermostat Name, enter your target temperature and set degrees. Optionally, you may also select your Arm Type as a Disarmed state, select your Thermostat Name, enter your target temperature and set degrees.

original_description: Set Honeywell Total Connect thermostat temperature based on a change in armed state of your Blue by ADT system. You may select a specific arm type such as Armed Away, Armed Stay, Armed Instant, or Armed - Any mode for your Blue by ADT system. Next, select your Thermostat Name, set to Heat or Cool and set your target temperature to hold. Optionally, you may also select your Arm Type as a Disarmed state, select your Thermostat Name, set to Heat or Cool and set your target temperature to hold.
